title: Pawn
description: Born into hell. Baptism by betrayal.His life revolves around violence. My life is on the line.I'm trapped both physically and emotionally. A pawn in a game I didn't know I was playing.Until I met him.Pike acts without emotion, but I know he feels something for me. I see it in his eyes when he looks at me. I feel it when he's close.I know it's real because I feel it too.Lust. Desire. It complicates everything.I'm part of Pike's plan for revenge.What he doesn't know is that he's part of mine.
author: T.M. Frazier
